segments.text: I could get along fine without all the office politics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a position I've had my eye on for several months now and I had good reason to believe that it was mine for the asking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We were awarded government funding last year and in order to keep it we have to hire so Ay new employees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what does that have to do with this position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Someone in the main office has a nephew who he thinks can slide right into the Management position I wanted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All under the precept of keeping the funding ? That stinks .
segments.speaker: S2
